DOC.brief_summary: Compare changes in bowel function before, 6 months and one year after Robotic-assisted laparoscopic sacral colpopexy. Compare objective anatomic outcomes before, 6 months and one year after Robotic-assisted laparoscopic sacral colpopexy.
DOC.brief_title: Cohort Study of Bowel Function Following Robotic-assisted Laparoscopic Sacrocolpopexy
DOC.criteria: All patients who underwent robotic assisted laparoscopic sacral colpopexy Any other procedure for the treatment of pelvic organ prolapse
